Text:
VeroVenlo - thank you so much for all the hard work.
Merry Christmas and all the best in the New Year to you and your family.
Hopefully you'll return with the 7th season :)

thanksssss!!!!!
you're gonna upload the Xtra Factor too, right?
Merry Christmas!
So nervious about the result!!! Thanks again! :)
Thx a lot ! U are my only opportunity to watch full episodes! but other idiot just crushed my day adding a file with a title "who win", before i watched :(
Thanksalot mate itÂ´ll be my pleasure to buy you a coffe in a year or two without you my weekends would be incomplete keep it up
Thank you soooooooo much, how much am I looking forward to this xxxx
Thank you for all your work. It's greatly appreciated.
Thanks so much for your efforts VV!
Thanx for sticking with it till the end Verovenlo, it's much appreciated!!
This was my first season ever watching X Factor. Now I'm hooked. I've enjoyed my weekends so much because of you verovenlo. Thanks!!!!
thanx again ;)
Thanks sooo much for all your hard work this Xfactor season...see you again for season 7!!!! Cant wait :)

Verovenlo, 
I have registered especially to leave you a comment and say a HUGE thank you for your downloads. Not only Xfactor, but all the others as well.
We don't leave in the UK anymore and we are so grateful for the time you spend doing this. Once again THANK YOU.
Merry Christmasxxx
Thanks so much for uploading these episodes. My mother and I watch it every week and we couldn't have without you!
Thanks a lot mate
once again thnx for the awesome comments everyone to bad the xfactor is over iam uploading the xtra factor in like 15 min from now

Just wanted to say thank you from Norway!
X Factor UK is 10000 times better than X Factor Norway!

Verovenlo.... THANK YOU so much.... you have kept me most entertained over here in Bangkok for the last few months. I followed you on Mininova (RIP) and now thankfully you're on here!!

Sadly, Stacey should have won, but you can't have it all!!! Thanks again!
soon Britain?s Got Talent 2010 will start i will upload the whole season also so maybe see u all soon again

You have been an absolute saviour throughout this series. Thank you again. I'm now going to have to avoid all forms of online media in order to enjoy the grand finale later today...

Thanks Verovenlo - very much appreciated.
Thank you so much for giving us the joy of being able to watch the x factor every week, Merry Christmas and all the best for 2010, Spain

You became a real friend the last months. I wish 2010 will bring you everything you want and a new dream, a new love, a new beginning for everyone!

And something i forgot to say...
Efharisto! (The greek word for thank you)

See you on Britain s got talent :)) HO HO HO

Registered especially to thank you so much for all your hard work and all the hours of entertainment! 
This is the first time I've watched The X factor and it's been amazing (even if frustrating at times, haha). 
Merry Xmas and a wonderful 2010!
Thanks again!
cheers verovenlo for uploading this, see you on the torrents for next year, ta mate

thanks verovenlo im over in malta and your uploads of the x factor have sorted my problem of when i watch x factor i:e when i want . you have been truly a top man taking time out to give us the full episodes,even as far as cutting out the adverts . what a guy!! nice one mate thanks again. here is to next year.  oh and remember in end of jan or beggining of feb starts simon cowells other x factor show . american idol which is the same if you havent seen it ,but on a bigger scale. starting very soon. if you like the x factor you will love this. in fact i prefer it
Verovenlo, Thank you so much for uploading the X Factor and Xtra Factor episodes. I have enjoyed all of them tremendously. Huge amounts of love and appreciation.
Thank you very much
